basic.description: The electrophysiology and biophysics of neuronal and cardiac membranes; molecular biology, structure, and function of ion channels. Students will learn to critically evaluate scientific literature. Instructional format is primarily student-led seminars.
basic.subject: PHGY
basic.title: Ion Channels of Excitable Cells

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    (A minimum grade of C in: PHGY 210/6.0 or PHGY 212/6.0 or PHGY 214/6.0) and Level 4 in a LISC Major or Specialization Plan) and (a GPA of 2.5), or permission fo the course coordinator.
